description: Quantitative success metrics for Negotiation Pro. Primary and secondary KPIs with formulas, weights, data sources, and reporting defaults.

_metadata.compat_note: Original concept preserved; all fields are additive and optional for consumers.

primary_metrics.name: Agreement Rate
primary_metrics.definition: Share of negotiations that end in an agreement.

primary_metrics.name: Value Capture Index
primary_metrics.definition: How close the outcome is to the target anchor or agreed value bands.
primary_metrics.notes: Normalized 0–1. Uses configured floor/target per scenario.

primary_metrics.name: Relationship Preservation
primary_metrics.definition: Post-interaction relationship score (self/peer rated) above threshold.

primary_metrics.name: Cycle Time to Decision
primary_metrics.definition: Median days from first scoping to final decision.
primary_metrics.notes: Proxy for momentum; complements Agreement Rate.

secondary_metrics.name: Concession Balance
secondary_metrics.definition: Balance between concessions given vs. received, normalized by value.

secondary_metrics.name: Data Credibility Acknowledgement
secondary_metrics.definition: Rate of counterpart acknowledging or accepting cited benchmarks.

secondary_metrics.name: Opener Fit Score
secondary_metrics.definition: Average rubric score for chosen opening vs. persona+culture.
secondary_metrics.notes: 1–5; fed by UI ratings and AI audit.

secondary_metrics.name: Escalation Defused
secondary_metrics.definition: Share of heated interactions de-escalated within two turns.

secondary_metrics.name: Discovery Depth
secondary_metrics.definition: Average count of deeper ‘why/ladder’ insights captured per negotiation.

threshold_alerts.action_suggestion: Push opener coaching; emphasize mutual_goal + anchor_high.
Recommend door_close and explicit decision window.
